name: vamji
description: The Shuttle Booking Application for Ayodhya is a Node.js-based backend system designed to manage local shuttle transportation services for pilgrims, tourists, and residents visiting the city of Ayodhya. The application provides a reliable platform for booking seats, managing shuttle routes, tracking availability, and handling paymentsâ€”all optimized for high traffic during peak pilgrimage seasons.
author: Ajeet Kesherwani
